name: Urban Street Fighter
description:
Find the original fighting experience with this hardcore beat'em up game.

Defeats your opponents with amazing stunts and blows.

Full 3D, Action-packed with realistic physics, 2 AI modes.

Single player or local multiplayer, 5 Levels of Difficulty for each AI modes, special moves and combos will provide you many hours of fun.

Menu navigation using mouse, Easy to master keyboard and/or Gamepad controls for players.
